amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that permitting authority for cross-border pipelines remains with the Department of State.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-235 to ensure that permitting authority for cross- border pipelines remains with the Department of State.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 246 (Roll no. 395).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 246 (Roll no. 395).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Engel.
